You are given an odd integer $n$ (where $3 \le n \le 101$).  You need to print a square matrix of size $n \times n$ representing a crystal. 

* The cells of the matrix should be either "*" or "D".
*  The "D" characters should form a diamond shape in the center of the matrix. 



Let me know if you'd like help with any specific part of solving this problem!
Given an odd number, create a square grid of that size. Fill the center of the grid with a diamond shape using the letter "D". Fill the rest of the grid with the letter "*".
